snippet: Three cities are in the running to host the 2019 world championships: Eugene, Ore.; Barcelona; and Doha, Qatar. Eugene is bidding to bring the event to the United States for the first time.
abstract: Eugene, Ore, Barcelona and Doha, Qatar are three remaining cities in running to host 2019 track and field world championships; successful bid from Eugene would bring event to United States for first time.
lead_paragraph: Three cities are in the running to host the 2019 world championships: Eugene, Ore.; Barcelona; and Doha, Qatar. Eugene is bidding to bring the event to the United States for the first time.

headline.main: U.S. City Pursues World Track Championships
